name: Storm Giant Monarch
description: The Storm Giant Monarch is a massive imposing figure, boasting an impressive stature that dominates the battlefield. Its skin resembles the turbulent sea, and its hair crackles with the energy of storms.
memorable: Its ability to command thunderstorms and unleash devastating lightning strikes makes it a captivating opponent.
goals: To wield its power over storms and protect its domain from intruders.
relations: Often found commanding lesser giants or aquatic creatures, and occasionally serves as a guardian to ancient secrets.
environment: Primarily found in coastal areas or mountainous regions, especially where storms frequently occur.
strengths: Immunity to lightning and thunder damage, high hit points, and versatile spellcasting abilities.
weaknesses: Large size can be a disadvantage in confined spaces, and its intelligence score may limit its tactical flexibility.
attacks: Multiattack with its greatsword, can throw rocks dealing significant bludgeoning damage, or unleash powerful lightning strikes.
most_powerful_ability: The Lightning Strike ability can hit multiple foes with a devastating area-of-effect lightning bolt.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 19, indicating sharp awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Possesses proficiency in athletics (+14), showcasing its physical prowess, and arcana and history skills (+8) demonstrating its magical knowledge.
additional_information: Can breathe air and water, making it amphibious.
Spellcasting capabilities enhance its combat and support abilities.
Can perform a Sword Sweep attack when bloodied, damaging multiple foes nearby.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like detect magic, control weather, and commune with innate spellcasting ability.

giant with powerful spellcasting and melee attacks
storm giant that can swim and breathe water
